features: 【Upgraded Flexible Durable Tripod】snawowo baby stroller fan has an upgraded tripod which is made of high quality bendable metal and food grade silicone surface instead of the old plastic and sponge surface. so you don't have to worry about the baby eating it by mistake. The tripod is waterproof, not easy to get dirty and broken, easy to clean, and more durable.

【Strong Wind & Low Noise】This mini stroller fan built-in brushless motor, which is powerful and has a long service life. One-button operation for switching 3 wind speeds. The low noise motor is suitable for your quiet office or reading, and suitable for your baby to sleep comfortably.

【USB or Rechargeable Battery Operated】This portable stroller fan is powered by USB or Battery using Type-C interface. It can be charged by computer, laptop, power bank, car charger etc. The build-in rechargeable battery has real 4000mAh, not fake capacity. 3.5hours for full recharge, 5~12 hours working time depends on speed.
【Versatile and Portable】Our rechargeable portable fan is small enough to take with you anywhere. It is convenient for bedrooms, desktops, strollers, camping, car seat, crib, treadmill, and travel.

【Ideal Summer Gift】Cute octopus fan that you and your kids will love, so it will be an ideal gift for your friends and family. If you are not completely satisfied, please feel free to contact us and we will provide you with a satisfactory after-sales warranty service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Using SNAWOWO upgraded baby stroller fan to give you, your baby, your family and friends a cool summer!

Based on a lot of user experience and feedback, our fans have been upgraded from the inside out: All-silicon and integrated molding tripod The new tripod uses new materials and manufacturing processes. It is soft, non-slip, so comfortable for you to handhold. It is waterproof and easy to clean, so convenience to use and health to your baby. It is hard to be broken, so durable to use for many years. Dense outer cover with gaps less than 6mm The denser gaps on the fan housing can prevent the baby's fingers or toes from entering the fan and getting injured. So it is safe for children. You can let your baby use it safely without any worries. 4000mAh rechargable battery The built-in battery has a larger capacity. It will work 5~12 hours depend on speed after about 3.5 hours fully charging. Type-C USB interface for easy charging, can be charged by computer, laptop , power bank, car charger etc.

The flexible tripod can be bent at any angle, so you can use it in any scene as you like: Handheld Straighten the stand mounts to be a grip handle, it can be used as a handheld fan. It is portable with small size and light weight, so it can be easily put in a shoulder bag, carried with you and used at any time. Standing This mini fan can stand on your desk stablely as a desk fan. It's height and angle can be adjusted according to your needs. Provide a comfortable and cooling environment to you, when you are working or gaming on a hot day. Winding Use your imagination, this fan can be tied or hung on any objects with sticks, such as stroller, crib, car seat, bicycles, parasols, treadmill, bike, etc., when you need it, give you a cool experience immediately.
Meet all your needs: handheld style for outdoors, standing style for desk, winding style for baby stroller, cribe, car seat, even a phone holder.

Specifications: Input: DC5V 0.8A(MAX)Power consumption: 3WBattery capacity: 4000mAhCharging duration: 3.5hoursWorking time: 5-12hoursSize: 11*4.3*3.2inchesWeight: 320g (0.70lb) Package list: 1 * Stroller Fan 1 * USB Charging Cable 1 * User Manual Why SNAWOWO Stroller Fan stands out? New upgraded flexible tripod designAll silicon and integrated molding tripodDense outer cover, safe for babyReal 4000mAh built-in rechargeable batteryAdjustable 3 speedsEquips brushless motor, strong airflow but ultra quietHandheld, standing or winding, meet all your needsPortable size to carry easily Warm Tips: 1. Please turn off the battery fan and take out the battery if you do not use for a long time. 2. Do not place this product in high humidity and high temperature. 3. Children to be used under the guidance of a guardian.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely amazing... Can last hours, more powerful than any other I've bought before. Has become really handy especially in the hot Seychelles climate where I live.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Update: I think it’s completely my fault the fan broke. I’m pretty sure I plugged it into the wrong charger that had too much power. I updated my stars to 5 because I do believe it was a good product, just user error!When I got this I was impressed by the power and battery life. That is the reason for the 3 stars.Now, I am 9 days passed the return window and this fan stopped working. I’m not even sure it needed to be charged, but I plugged it in because we were gonna have a couple hot days. (I had used it a few times so I figured it could use a full charge.) The fan turned on and the speed was higher than the fastest setting. I unplugged it and the fan slowed down to a more normal setting but wouldn’t shut off. In fact, the button now does nothing. I just had to let it die and it won’t turn back on so now it’s just another piece of garbage for the landfill. :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for constant operation
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this snawowo fan in my grow tent for the last month or two now and it has been running constantly without many issues. It does great at keeping my LED lights cooled even at the lowest level, this thing would do great outside at the highest level to keep someone cool. Battery life is not too impressive, with about 3-4 hours on a single 18650 at low power (may be due to old batteries I am using). The great thing about this using 18650 batteries is you could keep a few inside your pocket to keep the fan running all day long.Every once in while the fan makes a squeaking noise, which so far has been fixed by a medium strength slap to the exterior. Although a minor thing, it is the only con I could think of after using it 24/7 for this long. The silicone arms on the unit also can make it difficult to mount in the tent, but would do great at gripping a stroller or umbrella while walking around a theme park. Actually a UV resistant umbrella with the fan wrapped around the handle sounds like the perfect way to enjoy the outdoors!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite all year round fan!!
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite travel buddy and even great at the office!I have used it at the beach, long hikes, graduations, in the office and even used it for babies!It is great, high speed, long lasting battery and is smaller than my 40 oz. Stanley. Has 3 different modes and you can fix its legs to hold on to a beach umbrella or standing on your desk.I highly recommend it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It was great until it wasn’t
reviews.reviewText: Ultra portable, fairly good battery life.The good:The fan moves enough air on high to cool our baby down when attached at an arms length to the stroller. The USB-C plug makes charging a breeze if of you have other devices that use that type of plug like most of us do.The bad: The flexible legs bend so to make attaching to strollers, bikes, etc. easy. But the same legs are made of a metal (aluminum I think) that breaks after a handful of uses. For example, during a Disney trip we took, we attached and removed the fan each time we got onto the trolly to get back and forth from the car. Didn’t last long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We use this to blow air on my son in the car because he gets car sick and it helps a ton! (Our car doesn't have vents facing him.) He doesn't complain about car rides anymore. It's a life saver. It's super cute and looks great with my black interior. The legs are super adjustable but also really sturdy so it stays put wherever you put it. It also has a decent amount of power; plenty of flow for our purposes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This little cutie is exactly as it’s described. I had no issues with charging it and one charge lasted several days. The legs are easy to work with and it takes no time to get it flowing in the direction you want. I wish there were a charging “indicator light” to let you know when it’s low/completely charged, but functionally, I’ve had no issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: 3 speeds, chargeable, stands on its own. What more could you ask for?!

I love my fan; it accompanies me during my treadmill sessions at the gym, providing a refreshing breeze. With three adjustable speeds, it maintains its charge for an extended period, requiring infrequent recharging.

I was shocked at how great this fan is I know it might be a major statement but for some reason I've stopped needing my dyson fan as I find this just as good and more economically friendly electricity wise? It's perfect will likely buy another!

Great fan. Comes in multiple colours, has 3 speeds and can really cool. I am using in my bathroom to cool after showering in the summer. But can stand on a table or attach to almost anything. It is USB chargeable so no need for batteries. Would recommend.
Battery last over an hour, I use it when in the treadmill and even though I can't attach it to the treadmill, the legs give very good stability. For me it is just perfect
